mapper.select: SELECT t.Id, t.head_line, t.sercode, t.coverage, t.user_qq, t.user_wx, t.phone, t.link, t.createDate, t.company_name, t.procode, t.citycode, t.countycode, t.video_url, t.gg_src, t.z_a_img, t.z_b_img, t.z_c_img, t.a_a_img, t.a_b_img, t.a_c_img, t.details, t.address, t.`status`, t.del FROM fied t LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageSize}
